fields.text: Thank you for calling Jobspring Partners in San Francisco, your tech talent recruitment specialists.
If you are an IT professional seeking new opportunities, press [INDEX].
If you are an employer looking to hire IT talent, press [INDEX].
To browse our current IT job openings, press [INDEX].
To speak directly with a recruiter about your resume, press [INDEX].
To discuss your company’s IT staffing needs, press [INDEX].
To learn about our placement process and fees, press [INDEX].
Please hold for a moment while we retrieve our latest IT job openings.
Please hold while we connect you to a recruiter to discuss your resume.
Please hold while we connect you to one of our staffing consultants.
Please hold while we connect you to our client services team to explain the placement process.
